body:
This PR makes a number of visual improvements to the app.

- Improved and expanded color palette
- Add the ability to set a color for a group
- Re-positions the unread count in the conversation list to be a badge above the avatar
- Re-styles "fallback" avatars that we show when a user doesn't have a profile photo

**Test Devices**
* [Google Pixel 2, Android 9.0, API 28](https://www.gsmarena.com/google_pixel_2-8733.php)
* [Nexus 5X, Android 8.1, API 27](https://www.gsmarena.com/lg_nexus_5x-7556.php)
